sentences.en: Both the style and color of the men's windbreaker suit you very much.
sentences.cn: 这件男式风衣的样式颜色都很适合你!

sentences.en: For example, middle - long stand - collar windbreaker , with vertical lattice clothes and trousers will increase visual height.
sentences.cn: 比如中等长的立领风衣, 带竖格子的衣服和裤子都会增加视觉高度.

sentences.en: Monty was wearing a dark blue knitted sweater and over it an open leather windbreaker.
sentences.cn: 蒙蒂身穿一件深蓝色毛衣,罩一件敞胸的御风皮衣.

sentences.en: My windbreaker was waterproof, so that definitely kept my body dry.
sentences.cn: 我的风衣防水, 所以我的上半身是干燥的.

sentences.en: The girl was wearing a dark green knitted sweater and a windbreaker over it.
sentences.cn: 他身穿一件深绿色毛衣,罩了一件御风大衣.

sentences.en: This windbreaker is perfect for spring.
sentences.cn: 这件运动夹克很适合春天穿.

trans.tran_en: A Windbreaker is a jacket that resists the wind and fits closely at the waist and wrists
